plugin.label: retroFlange
plugin.name: Retro Flanger
plugin.p: A model of someone flanging the input.
Models the tape saturation effects, and frequency smear of a manual flanger. The results are a slightly distorted, but more subtle flanger sound that you get from a normal digital flanger.

port.label: delay_depth_avg
port.name: Average stall (ms)
port.p: The average time difference between the two tapes, per stall

port.label: law_freq
port.name: Flange frequency (Hz)
port.p: The rate the tape is stalled at.
